CustomField.formula: IF(Number_of_Recordings__c >= 1 && Account_Name__c = 'J.P. Morgan', "CO24902", IF(Number_of_Recordings__c = 0 && Account_Name__c = 'J.P. Morgan', "CO24751", ""))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula that looks at JP Morgan Accounts and if they have Recording products on them. The value will be used for invoicing purposes. Any questions Contact Tom Conigliaro or Finance.
CustomField.label: J.P. Morgan CO#
